subject: Loan Syndication - Invitation for {borrowerName}
body:
Hello,

Spurqlabs has invited you to participate in the syndicated loan facility for {borrowerName} You may log in to the LoanBook platform, and click on this deal listed on your invitations screen.

Invitations

If you do not have login credentials to the LoanBook platform, click on the link below and follow the instructions.

Register

Responses are expected by 18 Jul 2025. However, if you are not interested in this deal, you may click on the link below to avoid further updates.

Decline this invitation

Sincerely,

Team LoanBook.
